text-snippet.content:
All of our advertising partners are members of the Network Advertising Initiative ("NAI") or the Digital Advertising Alliance ("DAA"), which you can learn more about at these links:

NAI Homepage: http://www.networkadvertising.org,
NAI Opt-Out Page: http://www.networkadvertising.org/choices, 
DAA Homepage: http://www.aboutads.info, and
DAA Opt-Out Page: www.aboutads.info/choices or http://www.youronlinechoices.com/.
